mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CNTR (CNTR_ID , CNTR_NM , CRT_DT , CRTR , MDFY_DT , MDFYR , USE_YN , DEL_YN) VALUES (SEQ_CNTR_PK.NEXTVAL , #{cntrNm} , SYSDATE , #{crtr} , SYSDATE , #{mdfyr} , NVL(#{useYn},'N') , 'N' )
mapper.select:
SELECT C.CNTR_ID , C.CNTR_NM , TO_CHAR(C.CRT_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') CRT_DT , C.CRTR , TO_CHAR(C.MDFY_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') MDFY_DT , C.MDFYR , C.USE_YN , C.DEL_YN , CM.MBR_NM CRTR_NM , MM.MBR_NM MDFYR_NM FROM CNTR C JOIN MBR CM ON CM.MBR_ID = C.CRTR JOIN MBR MM ON MM.MBR_ID = C.MDFYR WHERE C.DEL_YN = 'N'
AND C.CNTR_NM LIKE '%' || #{cntrNm} || '%'
ORDER BY C.CNTR_ID
